Name: netlink
Description: Package netlink provides low-level access to Linux netlink sockets (AF_NETLINK). MIT Licensed.

Name: socket
Description: Package socket provides a low-level network connection type which integrates with Go's runtime network poller to provide asynchronous I/O and deadline support. MIT Licensed.

Name: packet
Description: Package packet provides access to Linux packet sockets (AF_PACKET). MIT Licensed.

Name: vsock
Description: Package vsock provides access to Linux VM sockets (AF_VSOCK) for communication between a hypervisor and its virtual machines.  MIT Licensed.

Name: kcm
Description: Package kcm provides access to Linux Kernel Connection Multiplexor sockets (AF_KCM). MIT Licensed.

Name: homelab
Description: Configuration management for Matt Layher's machines. MIT Licensed.

Name: ethtool
Description: Package ethtool allows control of the Linux ethtool generic netlink interface. MIT Licensed.

Name: wol
Description: Package wol implements a Wake-on-LAN client.  MIT Licensed.

Name: arp
Description: Package arp implements the ARP protocol, as described in RFC 826. MIT Licensed.

Name: ethernet
Description: Package ethernet implements marshaling and unmarshaling of IEEE 802.3 Ethernet II frames and IEEE 802.1Q VLAN tags. MIT Licensed.

Name: wireguard_exporter
Description: Command wireguard_exporter implements a Prometheus exporter for WireGuard devices. MIT Licensed.

Name: wifi
Description: Package wifi provides access to IEEE 802.11 WiFi device actions and statistics.  MIT Licensed.
